values:
Howard Stern was picking on Gabourey Sidibe on his show yesterday, talking about how overweight she is.  "There's the most enormous, fat black chick I've ever seen. She is enormous. Everyone's pretending she's a part of show business and she's never going to be in another movie," he said. "She should have gotten the Best Actress award because she's never going to have another shot. What movie is she gonna be in?"  He and co-host Robin Quivers went on to discuss the impossibility of Gabby finding any work in Hollywood after 'Precious.' 

"And Oprah's lying and saying you're going to have a brilliant career," said Robin. 

"Oprah's another liar, a filthy liar," said Stern. "She's telling an enormous woman the size of a planet that she's going to have a career."

If you don't know who she is, Gabourey Sidibe was nominated for an Oscar for Best Actress in the film Precious.  

Okay, yes, she needs to lose weight; the pounds she's packing now are obviously unhealthy.  But, everybody deserves some respect, no matter how heavy he/she is.  

Poor Gabourey stuck out like a sore thumb amongst all the anorexic actresses out there - easy pickings for someone like Howard Stern.  It's unhealthy to be a size zero too, but for some reason, it's funnier and more popular to pick on people who are overweight.
Why are older women who date younger men called "cougars?"  So what do you call an older man who dates a younger woman?  The term is offensive and ridiculous to me.
Does anybody know what hotels use to get that fresh smell they always have?
Wouldn't it make a lot more sense to do a Ren Faire in Texas say...in mid to late November when the weather is at least tolerable???  I just don't get it...

Someone correct me if I'm wrong, but isn't a company email system meant to make communication between employees, clients, etc... a lot easier and more efficient?

If that's the case, then why the fuck are coworkers calling me and having me type emails to my boss?  They're at their own desks in front of their own computers...can't they type their own fucking emails?  I mean honestly people, what the fuuuuuuuuuck?????

So they're saying she probably lost the crown because of her answer.

Sorry, but if she'd said she supports gay marriage, every single right wing Christian in America would be screaming that she shouldn't be Miss USA because she doesn't support "family values," or whatever else they could come up with.

It was a bad question for a pageant.  She might as well have been asked about her religious beliefs and whether she believes a muslim should be president or some other sensational nonsense...it was a question clearly designed to create the divisiveness that Perez Hilton is complaining about...

Why are people so stupid?

Me, I'm tired of so many things... 

I'm tired of the way everybody in Texas seems to have a country twang voice. 
I'm tired of how the IT guy asks me "Whatcha eatin'?" every time I happen to be chewing something. 
I'm tired of hearing my alarm clock go off 5 days a week. 
I'm tired of people looking me straight in the eye while they lie to me and I know it. 
I'm tired of hearing the phrase "Good Morning." 
I'm tired of listening to people small talk about the weather and what they did this weekend. 
I'm tired of spending almost my entire life doing things I don't want to do. 
I'm tired of being a slave to bills and rent. 
I'm tired of never getting enough sleep and waking up 10 times a night. 
I'm tired of being stressed and depressed and having to take pills for it. 
I'm tired of people telling me I should go to church. 
I'm tired of hypocrites who go to church and claim to believe but have nothing to show for it. 
I'm tired of hearing the phone ring.
I'm tired of people who are full of shit.
I'm tired of people who abuse animals.
I'm tired of having nothing to look forward to. 

But mostly, I'm just tired of life in general.

I swear if I hear one more mofo at work tell me that what I'm eating looks disgusting, I'm gonna blow a gasket.

Since when do fresh tomatoes and avocado look disgusting????  Oh that's right, it doesn't look like a hamburger and fries, so it MUST be disgusting.

I honestly don't know why they bother giving us time off at work.  Every time I come back after having a couple days off, I am so swamped and stressed out, it really wasn't worth taking the time off in the first place.  Not that I really want to come to work on the days we have off...I just wish the people I worked for didn't assume that it's physically possible for me to get three days' worth of work packed into just one.

Whatever.  It's just more of the SSDD around here....

ME WANT!!!  I wish I were still a kid again.  My dad would have bought me this in a heartbeat.  If I got this for Christmas I would FREAK.

http://disneyshopping.go.com/disney/store/Product_10002_10051_1232544_-1_11798

Coworker:  Candace!  I can't believe you don't own a cell phone!

Me:  Nope, don't want one, don't need one.

Coworker:  Let me ask you a question....if your dogs could talk, would you own a cell phone?

Me:  YOU'RE DANG SKIPPY I'D OWN A CELL PHONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


I never thought about it in those terms before.  Heh.  And for those of you who know me and know how attached I am to my dogs....sweet little Pablo in particular....this makes total sense.

Just a thought, but if you had a newborn baby with Down Syndrome, would you think it's a good idea to be putting all your effort into a cause like running for Vice President of the United States?  A baby with this condition needs all the love and support it can get from both its parents IMO.

After much insisting by the guys at Gamestop, I finally broke down and bought The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.  I am HOOKED.  If someone had told me 10 years ago that I'd turn into a solid gamer in my 30's I would have said pffft yeah right.  

So, for those of you who have played the game....I've contracted porphyric hemophilia (vampirism) and I'm on a quest for the cure.  In this game, it's NOT cool (IMO) to be a vampire, because you'll have to spend the rest of the game finding people to feed on or else you won't be able to go out during the day.  Oh and a pack of wolves killed my horse yesterday.  Yikes.  For my race profile I chose a female Dark Elf, and I'm born under the sign of the Thief.  

Now to see if there's anybody on here geeky enough to know what I'm talking about....

So, the partner I work for comes around the corner all wild-eyed and foaming at the mouth...."OMGGGGGGGGG is the copy machine broken??????"

I follow her to the copy machine...."Uh, well, it needs to be turned on is all....."

Can somebody please hand her her sign?

1.  For the love of God, how difficult could it be to figure something out on your own for once?????

2.  Please please please STFU.  I can hear your hysterical laughter and guffawing THROUGH MY EARPLUGS for chrissake.

3.  If one more person asks me where K.H. is I'm gonna go postal.
Oh no no no no noooooo WTFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF????

You Are a Question Mark
You seek knowledge and insight in every form possible. You love learning.
And while you know a lot, you don't act like a know it all. You're open to learning you're wrong.

You ask a lot of questions, collect a lot of data, and always dig deep to find out more.

Your friends see you as interesting, insightful, and thought provoking.

What Punctuation Mark Are You?
Happy birthday to my best buddy ever in the whole entire world!
<lj-template name="qotd" id="393"></lj-template> Homemade mac and cheese, medium rare ribeye steak, chocolate cake with LOTS of frosting

I'm interested in these.

Opinions?  Experiences?
Looks like I will be waiting in line at midnight along with the rest of the freaks and geeks,  since the prospect of actually waiting til the next day is out of the question.

Due to some life changes, this will probably be my last public post for a while, and my posts will now be friends-only.

I have also deleted some people from my friends list.  If you were one of the ones to go, sorry.  No offense intended, I just need some parts of my life kept private for now.

Cheers...

Dood, I literally had to get bundled up from head to toe so I wouldn't get eaten alive by the mosquitoes outside....they are like literally SWARMING now.  And when I say swarming...I mean SWARMING.  This morning, I was walking the dogs, and I looked down....I was COVERED in mosquitoes....I must have looked like a damn fool screaming and slapping myself all over and running towards the house with the dogs in tow.  I bought some Deep Woods Off and used it for their afternoon walk, and it seemed to work pretty good.  The dogs have their Revolution on, so they should be protected as well.  Anyway, at night, I don't want to get sprayed down with Off...it's kinda stinky and sticky and I'm about to get into bed....so I put on long pants,boots, a shirt and a sweat shirt.  I'm making darn skippy those little suckers don't have a chance in hell to bite me.

WTFFFFFFFFFFFFf  When is this rain going to end?????  Mosquitoes are EVIL.  EVIL I TELL YA.

One of the attorneys I work for is about to drive me slap-ass crazy.

Have I ever mentioned how much I hate my job before?

O. M. G.

Can you please just STFU already?  I am so sick and tired of everybody in this office speaking at nearly a shouting level.  There are people around you trying to conduct business phone calls and attempting to concentrate on their work.  We are in a fucking office for chrissake.  I can't even hear myself talking on the phone over all your squawking and laughing and hooting.  The level of your voice is unacceptable even with my fucking earplugs on.  FERFUCKSAKE STFU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Live grenades stuffed in loud mouths would be a nice solution.

So...I'm hungry right now, and I feel like telling everybody what some of my favorite foods are and what I could probably subsist on for the rest of my life, no complaints.

peanut butter
potatoes - any style
chocolate cake - LOTS of milk chocolate icing
grilled ribeye - rare to medium rare, thank you
macaroni and cheese - LOTS AND LOTS of cheese

Me hungry.
Ugh, overly enthusiastic, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed people who happily chirp, "Good morning," make me want to blow chunks.  Literally.

Ok dude.  Just because you've been out on vacation for a week doesn't mean you should come back and make my life miserable just because you have to catch up on fifty million things that have happened since you've been gone.

The more I think about this, the more pissed off I get.

This past Friday, a secretary who works with me admitted that she took a letter from my filing to make a copy of the letter...and then lost the letter before she could put it back where she found it.  We need this letter as an exhibit to file a Motion to Compel with the court this week.  All this crap went down late Friday afternoon, and I told her I would go ahead and call the person who sent us the document on Monday morning, to see if she would resend it.  

So...guess who calls in sick today?  Yep, the secretary who lost my letter.  Lucky for her, I got in touch with the letter's originator, and she faxed me the letter again this morning.  Long story short, Miss "I'm gonna call in sick and let Candace catch hell" is lucky I was able to get another copy of that letter, because I would have gladly thrown her under the bus for calling in sick today, so that I could handle her fuckup.  

People suck big, gigantic, hairy nads.  No wonder I prefer my dogs and books.

A few days ago, a murder was committed in my back yard.  A murder of monstrous proportions...a heinous crime....not against nature, though.  Heh.

Looking out the back door, I could see Pablo busy getting after something under a bush.  His entire body was wagging and shaking, so I knew it must be something alive.  I opened the back door and went to investigate...as I got closer, Pablo decided to grab his prey and run...it immediately started screaming wildly....I couldn't figure out what the hell it was because Pablo moved so quickly, thrashing his head all about, and he wouldn't drop it.

It only took Joel a minute to come outside to see WTF all the commotion and "NO PABLO, STOP NO NO NO NO!!!!" was all about.  As soon as Pablo saw Joel coming, he dropped the...*gasp* baby bird, and hunkered his guilty little body down, as Joel picked him up to be deposited inside the house.  In the meantime, the baby bird was screaming in agony and pain.  Its body was crushed and bleeding from Pablo's sharp canines and all the shaking and thrashing that Pablo had inflicted on it.  Joel grabbed a big stick and immediately put it out of its misery.

So there you have it.  A murder in my back yard.  And Pablo is as pleased as punch about it.

Just fyi (in case you don't already know this), Pablo is a rat terrier...and terriers are bred to kill. Period.  It was quite amazing to see Pablo's instinctive prey drive in action.  While I don't condone killing baby birds, Pablo was doing what comes naturally to him.  That baby bird was doomed either way, having fallen from its nest at such an early age.
Ugh why can't she just OD and put us out of our misery already?
That's right. The sweetest pea in the whole world is turning four today.

You guys...my job is so insanely stressful right now that I feel physically ill.  I just want to leave and never come back here again.  Remember that post I made not too long about about life being more trouble than it's worth?  Ugh.

Time for some bitching.

I'm tired of clearing my throat.  My allergies are acting up big time, and I have post-nasal drip (YUCK).  I have to talk to people all freaking day long, either in person or on the phone...constant yickety yacking...and I'm tired of my voice peetering out and getting all scratchy and icky, and having to clear the "frog" out of throat.  I'm talking and all of a sudden my voice cuts off into a scratchy mess, and I have to stop, clear my throat, excuse myself, take a sip of water, collect my thoughts, continue...DAMMIT.  

You guys have no idea how bad I need a vacation from life.  No wonder I'm dreaming about getting lost forever in one of my fantasy books.

Ever read a book or see a movie that you wish like crazy you could get sucked up into, never to return to this world?  When I was little, I used to pray that something like what happened to the kids in the Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe would happen to me.  Hell, I still pray for that.

Anyway...my all time favorite fantasy/sci fi books that I wish I could "cross over" to are the Chronicles of Narnia series, His Dark Materials trilogy, the Ender series, and of course, the Harry Potter series.  

It's not fair...why can't my life be as interesting as the books I read?

I watched Sid and Nancy last night.  I've seen it lots of times before.  I know the punk rock scene is over-dramatized in that movie....but still, I've actually known "punk rockers" who strive to behave the way they do in that film.  Why would you want to be obnoxious and rude and physically destructive all the time?  Just to prove how anti-establishment you are?

There's lots of ways to do that, AND with a little class and style and creativity.  

Punk rocker mentality is retarded.  Sid and Nancy did us all a favor by dying early deaths, ugh.
how jedi are you? :: by lawrie malen
Sometimes being alive is a lot more trouble than it's worth.  Seriously.

Rude or not rude:

The firm had a boxed lunch provided for a meeting, but a lot of people didn't show for the meeting.  As a result, there were seven boxed lunches left over, first come first serve.  

Here's my question:  Is it rude to grab say four or five of the lunches, put your name on them, and put them in the fridge, thereby not giving others a chance to enjoy it?  

Personally, I think it's greedy and rude, but that's just me.

Just so you all know, I'm really really really hating on my job right now.  No lunch breaks - expected, not requested - and having so much to do that I have to send out emails for other people to help....my patience and willingness to continue doing this crap is wearing thin.

Why so busy you ask?  Oh, because the boss is going on vacation next week, and she wants everything done before she leaves.  All I can say is it suurrree must be nice to be the boss, and it sure does suck to be a "pee-on."  

Yowza.
